actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the use of tax return information by preparers of returns.
short_title: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit tax return preparers from: (1) soliciting taxpayers for consent to the disclosure or use of their tax return information for any purpose; and (2) disclosing tax return information to tax preparers located outside the United States without taxpayer consent.

titles.title: Taxpayer Information Protection and Privacy Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restrict the use of tax return information by preparers of returns.
